citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee continued to exhibit animals at the Buffalo, NY location noted on the previous inspection report. The licensee
did not submit an itinerary to account for exhibition that occurred since the the July 31, 2024 inspection through October
2024. An itinerary should have been sent to the office to account for the long-term overnight travel. A written itinerary
must be submitted to the Deputy administrator at least two days prior to the start of overnight travel to facilitate the
inspection of travelling animals. An itinerary must be submitted per regulation with all subsequent exhibition that requires
an overnight stay at locations other than the home site.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licenesee.
n

narrative:
2.126(c)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The licensee continued to exhibit animals at the Buffalo, NY location noted on the previous inspection report. The licensee 
did not submit an itinerary to account for exhibition that occurred since the the July 31, 2024 inspection through October 
2024. An itinerary should have been sent to the office to account for the long-term overnight travel. A written itinerary 
must be submitted to the Deputy administrator at least two days prior to the start of overnight travel to facilitate the 
inspection of travelling animals. An itinerary must be submitted per regulation with all subsequent exhibition that requires 
an overnight stay at locations other than the home site. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licenesee. 
 
 n
